## Simple Map Data

```{r japan}
world_map <- map_data("world")
ggplot(world_map[world_map$region == "Japan", ], aes(long, lat, group = group)) +
  geom_polygon(fill = "white", color = "black") +
  coord_quickmap()                      # Sets the aspect ratio correctly for maps
```
